name: RemoveBiterSoil
title: Remove Biter Soil & Nuke Scorch Marks
author: NightlyCoder
description: Removes biter soil and nuke scorch marks in any given radius. Usage: Pick up a tile ghost (e.g. hazard concrete in quickbar) and place it on top of a destroyed biter nest or nuke crater. Afterwards use the deconstruction planner with the tile ghost filter enabled to cleanup the ghosts. Also works in map mode.
